#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	map<char,string> A;
	A[ '1' ] = "pa";
	A[ '2' ] = "re";
	A[ '3' ] = "ci";
	A[ '4' ] = "vo";
	A[ '5' ] = "mk";
	A[ '6' ] = "x";
	A[ '7' ] = "zi";
	A[ '8' ] = "bi";
	A[ '9' ] = "so";

	int i, n;
	string a, b;

	cin >> a;

	n = a.length();
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
		cout << A[ a[ i ] ];
	cout << endl;
	
	return 0;
}
